INSERT INTO PROPOSAL_FORM VALUES (SEQ_PROPOSAL_FORM.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{prTitle}, #{prGoal}, #{prPlan}, #{prStartDate}, #{prEndDate}, #{prPerson}, #{prAmount}, SEQ_APPROVAL.CURRVAL, #{foNo}, #{mNo})
INSERT INTO PAYMENT_FORM VALUES (SEQ_PAYMENT_FORM.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{payTitle}, #{payDay}, #{payList}, #{payAmount}, SEQ_APPROVAL.CURRVAL, #{foNo}, #{mNo})
